TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SystemFonts extends System.Object
public ref class SystemFonts abstract sealed

summary.span: Contém propriedades que expõem os recursos do sistema que envolvem fontes.

span.span: Contains properties that expose the system resources that concern fonts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CaptionFontFamily As FontFamily
public: static property System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ CaptionFontFamily { System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtém a métrica que determina a família de fontes da legenda da área não cliente de uma janela não minimizada.

span.span: Gets the metric that determines the font family of the caption of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Obter a métrica de SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS.Obtain the metric from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS. Ver [SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp).See [SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp). ## Uso do Atributo XAMLXAML Attribute Usage <*propriedade de objeto*= "{SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily`}`" / ><*object property*="{ SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily`}`"/>
